about_the_game:
You are unemployed, struggling to pay your bills. Working seems to be your only way out
Work on various jobs, earn cash to survive, master the required skills, and aim to become the employee-of-the-month! 

As for now, only the job "Working in a restaurant" is available.

Gameplay

Each job offers unique gameplay, with tasks that vary widely : making burgers won't be the same as serving customers or making the ice creams. You'll have to master every aspect of the job as things rarely go as planned.

Manage your money and experience wisely to unlock upgrades for your jobs and improvements for your home.

Fail to pay your bills and it's game-over.

Story

Every job comes with its own story, featuring a mix of mystery, paranormal events, and horror elements. For example, the restaurant job includes a ghost story. Don’t stay late after hours - strange things might happen.

If you're feeling brave, you can try uncovering the secrets of each job by unlocking special tools and conducting your own investigations.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) x64
  • Processor: x64 Architecture
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Non
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64, Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: x64 Architecture
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Non
